name: The Dice Wizard must Die!
description:
Survive waves of enemies for five minutes with skill, luck, and powerful upgrades! Throw your dice to damage enemies then pull it back to reuse. Upgrade options show up periodically. Some upgrades affect your dice directly, others are additional effects that bind to one side of your dice and trigger whenever that side is rolled.

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Click - Throw Dice (towards mouse cursor)

Right Click (hold) - Retrieve nearby dice

Tips

Your own dice and dice effects can hurt you! Watch out.

A dice effect adds a power to one side of a dice, you will need to roll that face to trigger it.
